content:
donald Trump became the forty-fifth president of the United States on the steps of the U.S PERIOD Capitol at noon EST PERIOD

Fellow Americans and people of the world thank you Trump said in his inaugural address PERIOD Today we are not merely transferring power from one administration to another we are transferring power from Washington DC and giving it back to you the people. trump was sworn in by Chief Justice John Roberts under overcast skies minutes after Associate Justice Clarence Thomas swore in Vice President Mike Pence PERIOD Thomas is the first AfricanAmerican in history to administer the Oath PERIOD

In the address President Trump echoed populist themes that were central to his campaign saying Americas interests alone will be the top priority PERIOD

From this day forward it is going to be only America first America first President Trump said PERIOD Every decision will be made to benefit American workers and American families PERIOD Protection will lead to great prosperity and strength We have made other countrys rich while the wealth and strength of our country has dissipated over the horizon PERIOD ..That is the past PERIOD We are looking now only to the futureWhether we are black brown or white we all bleed the same red blood of patriots Trump said PERIOD We all enjoy the same glorious freedoms and we all salute the same American flag When you open your heart to patriotism there is no room for prejudice. in stark contrast with these calls for unity were the approximately  empty seats left by House Democrats who took part in a boycott of the inauguration PERIOD The boycott grew significantly after the then presidentelect tweeted Saturday that John Lewis Democratic congressman from Georgia and civil rights icon should finally focus on the burning and crime infested innercities. the country still faces significant domestic struggles including violence poverty and education issues all of which need to be addressed Trump said PERIOD

Americans want great schools for their children safe neighborhoods for their families and good jobs for themselves Trump said PERIOD But for too many of our citizens a different reality exists mothers and children trapped in poverty in our inner citiesand the crime and the gangs and the drugs that have stolen too many lives This American carnage stops right here and stops right now PERIOD



Trump concluded his speech with a familiar campaign refrain PERIOD

Together we will make America strong again Trump said PERIOD We will make America wealthy again PERIOD We will make America proud again PERIOD We will make America safe again PERIOD And yes together we will make America great again. the J20 UT WalkOut protest began at the Tower around  a.m PERIOD This protest is expected to march downtown where it will merge at  p.m PERIOD with One Resistance Protest a greater Austin demonstration PERIOD This protest will begin at Auditorium Shores and march down Congress Ave PERIOD to the Capitol Building PERIOD







Official newspaper of The University of Texas at Austin
title: Live blog: Trump sworn in as president, protests begin â€“ The Daily Texan
name: University of Texas Austin
